definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The following is the text of Senator Clinton's letter today to the Secretary of the Army.
sentences.chinese: 全文如下参议员克林顿的一封信，今天陆军大臣。

sentences.english: The advocates of tele-education give their arguments as follows.
sentences.chinese: 远程教育的倡导者给出了他们的论点如下。

sentences.english: This definition follows, with key characteristics bolded.
sentences.chinese: 定义如下，其中重要部分用粗体字表示。

sentences.english: The VRC PRO upgrade-refund guarantee works as follows.
sentences.chinese: 添加专业的升级退款保证工程如下。

sentences.english: There was a folk story as follows.
They must be a minimum of Google PR4 and meet the list of requirements below.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须是谷歌个PR4，满足最低需求列表如下。

sentences.english: Open Disk Utility. Create a new image with these options.
sentences.chinese: 打开磁盘工具，创建一个新镜像，参数如下。

sentences.english: The revenue is derived from the following sources.
The occupations of these people are presented below.1
sentences.chinese: 这些人的职业介绍如下。

sentences.english: The ranking results of Taiwanese universities could also have been adversely affected by the following.
sentences.chinese: 台湾的大学排名落后，原因有如下数端。

sentences.english: The dissertation illustrates the characteristics of the postmodernist poetics from the following aspects:The Pelevin phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 论文从如下几个方面阐释作品的后现代主义诗学特征。

sentences.english: The work products listed below have been introduced in this plug-in.
sentences.chinese: 如下所列的工作产品已包含在本插件中。

sentences.english: Be as follows all sorts of viewpoint cento now.
sentences.chinese: 现将各种观点摘录如下。

sentences.english: Based on my study of them, I can make several observations.
sentences.chinese: 根据对它们的研究，我可以提出如下几点观点。

sentences.english: Some illustrations of an integrated front panel are provided below.
sentences.chinese: 综合性前面板如下图所示。

sentences.english: Let me tabulate the results as follows.

definition: that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached
to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
